summary: Allows selecting sleep/wait time of greater than 24 hours.
descriptionHtml:
This modifies the sleep wait menu to allow sleeping or waiting for up to 48 hours (Now customizable via config file, check the txt file in the file). Tired of having to wait two times in order for shops to reset? :)

Currently works with keyboard, mouse, and confirmed 360 controller (thanks thesaboteur1400 and Darkravenkim). Current functionality stays (left/right to increase, page up/down to skip, and home/end to go to each end).

Waiting 48 hours is extremely slow as the swf has no control over how the game waits. Will probably require the CK to fix this.

Manual Installation:
Extract to the skyrim install directory.

Manual Uninstallation:
Open the skyrim install directory, open directory Data\\Interface\\, remove the file \"sleepwaitmenu.swf\"

OR

Use Nexus Mod Manager, it should extract everything to the correct directory. To uninstall using this method, you still may need to remove the file as stated in Manual Uninstallation.
author: theit8514

files.name: Sleep Wait Menu 48hours 1_1
files.changelogHtml: Added configuration file with customizable max value.
